item.title: Another Blogging Platform
item.author: Rob Fuller
item.description: Yes yes yes, I know, another platform, but guess what, it’s my blog, so ne-ner-ne-ner-ne-ner Hugo removed what I didn’t like about Octopress (the generating / pushing of content using a mix of branches and such) The reason I moved from Blogger was I just can’t stand having to log in and be online to make posts. I love things like MarsEdit for doing offline posts to services like Blogger, but I never could get the formatting right when I was done, especiall for code, so I’m back to a markdown based system.
